question: Oh! What happened? You found out you woke up as a penguin… After the initial shock, you start to collect your thoughts:

A.desc: “Oh no what is going on? I wonder if it feels the same walking in flippers...”

B.desc: Wow this is so interesting! Let’s find out what I can do as a penguin!

question: Knock knock! You open the door to 4 other penguins. “Hey! Hurry up, we are going to be late for the annual cooking competition!"

A.desc: Woah a cooking competition? Let’s go!

B.desc: Er what is going on? What competition? What are we going to cook?

question: Before you know it, your friends dragged you to the townhall to begin the competition. “Hey seems like each one of us has to pick a task: Washing, Cutting, Cooking, Tasting, Plating."

A.desc: You immediately picked the task you know you are good at.

B.desc: I will just pick the tasks that is leftover. The rest can pick first!

question: 2 hrs of cooking had past and it was time for the judging. Your team huddled together in hopes that the judge would like it… “Hmm the salmon was… raw. I can't eat this.” Suddenly, you see your teammate tearing up...

A.desc: You immediately go and give your teammate a hug and seeing him makes you want to tear up too, knowing everyone's hard work in this.

B.desc: You try to comfort your teammate by telling him that this is not the end of the world and there will be other cooking competitions next time!

question: Despite the mistake, your group decided to head down to the nearest igloo bar to raise everyone's spirits! Since the bar was full, the group had to split:

A.desc: You sit with the penguins that were looking back on the funny moments that happened during the competition.

B.desc: You chill with the penguins that talked about absolutely anything, even abstract topics like the possibilities of penguins ever being humans.

question: The night was great and you felt like the drinks you had were awesome too. Upon searching the Penguin Reviews, this bar surprisingly only had a 2.9 stars rating.

A.desc: Oh did i got lucky and ordered something good? Maybe the drinks weren't as good as i thought?

B.desc: Penguins are weird, the drinks were good though.

question: After an eventful day, you bid farewell to the new friends you had made and went back to tug yourself into bed. Staring at the icy ceiling:

A.desc: You play all the different scenarios in your mind about how tomorrow might go

B.desc: You play a singular scenario in your mind about how tomorrow would most likely go

question: Ring ring… your alarm rang. And suddenly you are back home and back to your human self!

A.desc: Damn… i got to go and tell as many people about my crazy adventure

B.desc: Oh my… let me think about what has just happened and maybe find some of my close friends to talk about what just had happened...
